pages.text: Schnauzers were originally bred for herding livestock and guarding farms, though were later used as police and military dogs.$(br2)Standing at roughly three quarters of a block tall, these hard-working dogs come in two different coats.
These dogs are found most commonly in plains and meadows. They can also be found in some jungles, and more rarely in deserts.
pages.title: Location
Taming
pages.text: These dogs can be tamed with a Beef or Mutton Treat.
